CustomField.description:
This field will mark is an account is qualified for the D&B Optimizer package.
BE WARNED: If this field's criteria is changed our AccountTests class will need to be altered and the existing tests will fail
CustomField.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = 'Fleet', OR(Number_of_Vehicles__c >=20, Number_of_Sites__c >=5), Status__c <> "Delete", SLED_Account__c != True, Owner.LastName <> "Reservoir" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will mark is an account is qualified for the D&B Optimizer package.
CustomField.label: Allow D&B Optimizer
